segments.text: I see the girl standing there, reaching up for a cookie like she’s begging for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s waiting for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is the one doing all the risky work, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get caught before they get what they want.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl doesn’t seem to care about the danger, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, but I doubt it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to end badly for someone.
segments.speaker: PAR
